hotels.vendor_name: Hotel Des Arts Saigon - MGallery Collection
hotels.title: Chic Art-Deco Inspired Ho Chi Minh City Indulgence with Three Restaurants, Rooftop Pool & Club
hotels.description: Step into the yesteryear elegance of 1930s Vietnam at this chic five-star sanctuary, where French Indochine charm meets modern luxury in the heart of Ho Chi Minh City. Just a short stroll from Notre Dame Cathedral and Ben Thanh Market, this MGallery Collection hotel blends an artistic flair with world-class hospitality. Soak up spectacular sunsets and skyline views from the rooftop infinity pool, sip cocktails at the stylish Social Club, or savour refined British fare at The Albion by Kirk Westaway. From the nostalgic charm of Café des Beaux-Arts to the vibrant flavours of Saigon Kitchen Restaurant, every moment here is a celebration of Vietnamese culture. After a day of exploration, retreat to the Le Spa des Artistes by L'Apothiquaire for restorative treatments.
